name: Primer (Caseus_serg)
description:
Primer is a new take on top-down shooters. Clear rooms full of random amounts of various enemies. Gain points for every kill, and gain a large sum of points for finishing a level depending on what enemies it had. Last as long as you can to get a high score, and compare scores with your friends!

This is my first time ever making a game, there are many bugs I am aware of and fixing, please be nice.

Menu music - 

 Cyberpunk Computer Game | IDRA by Alex-Productions | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx0_M61F81Nfb-BRXE-SeVA
